revised_title: A Post-Mortem Examination of Dr. Maty's Illness and Findings
tldr: This article details the post-mortem examination of Dr. Maty, who suffered from a long-term illness. The main findings were an annular stricture in the colon, inflammation and ulceration, and a contracted and diseased rectum. The cause of the illness remains conjectural, but it is likely related to damage sustained by the gut.
